code: import React,{useState}from"react";import reviews from"./data";import Title from"./components/Title";import Idea from"./components/Idea";import{FiChevronLeft,FiChevronRight}from"react-icons/fi";import{FaQuoteRight,FaQuoteLeft}from"react-icons/fa";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[index,setIndex]=useState(0);function leftShiftHandler(){index-1<0?setIndex(reviews.length-1):setIndex(index-1);};function rightShiftHandler(){index+1===reviews.length?setIndex(0):setIndex(index+1);};function surpriceShiftHandler(){const supriceIndex=Math.floor(Math.random()*reviews.length);setIndex(supriceIndex);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"h-screen w-full flex flex-col bg-gradient p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mx-auto text-4xl sm:text-5xl md:text-6xl mt-8 sm:mt-11 font-extrabold text-center",children:"48 LAWS OF POWER"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center text-sm sm:text-base md:text-lg font-medium mt-3",children:"~ Robert Greene"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mx-auto text-lg sm:text-xl p-2 sm:p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaQuoteLeft,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{review:reviews[index]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mx-auto text-lg sm:text-xl p-2 sm:p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaQuoteRight,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Idea,{review:reviews[index]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-center gap-4 sm:gap-5 mt-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:leftShiftHandler,className:"text-3xl sm:text-5xl",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiChevronLeft,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:rightShiftHandler,className:"text-3xl sm:text-5xl",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiChevronRight,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:surpriceShiftHandler,className:"mx-auto w-28 sm:w-40 h-10 sm:h-12 mt-5 text-lg sm:text-xl rounded-md bg-gray-900 text-white",children:"New One!"})]});};export default App;
